description:
Linux, with its powerful command-line interface, provides users with a myriad of tools to monitor and manage processes efficiently. In this guide, we’ll explore simple commands that new Linux users can use to check the duration of a running process.

The post How to Check How Long a Process Has Been Running in Linux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Check How Long a Process Has Been Running in Linux

description:
Linux hardware vendor Juno Computers announced today the Neptune 17 v6 Linux-powered laptop with a 14th generation Intel Core processor and up to NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 graphics.

The post Juno Computers Launches Neptune 17 v6 Linux Laptop With Up to NVIDIA RTX 4090 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Juno Computers Launches Neptune 17 v6 Linux Laptop With Up to NVIDIA RTX 4090

description:
Postfix 3.9 MTA embraces MongoDB, upgrades MySQL/pgSQL clients, and tightens security with essential improvements.

The post Postfix 3.9 Email Server Introduces MongoDB Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Postfix 3.9 Email Server Introduces MongoDB Support

description:
New logo, new features: Immich v1.98.0, a Google Photos alternative, enhances your experience with simplified settings and advanced search.

The post Immich 1.98.0 Introduces New Logo and App Enhancements appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Immich 1.98.0 Introduces New Logo and App Enhancements

description:
Fedora Workstation 41 will not include GNOME Xorg sessions by default, as the team leans towards embracing Wayland’s benefits.

The post Fedora 41 Drops the GNOME Xorg Sessions appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Fedora 41 Drops the GNOME Xorg Sessions

description:
Ubuntu’s parent company — now powering millions of desktops, servers, and clouds — continues to seek the balance between delivering ‘Linux for Human Beings’ and embracing its responsibilities in the global tech market.

The post Canonical Turns 20: Shaping the Ubuntu Linux World appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Canonical Turns 20: Shaping the Ubuntu Linux World
